transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, aawaz aa rahi hai?
Customer: Haan ji sir aa rahi hai.
Executive: Sir mere ko complaint raise karana hai ek.
Customer: Company register karani hai?
Customer: Complaint raise karana hai bhaiya.
Executive: Complaint raise karana hai, bataiye. Kis company se baat kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Sir main baat kar raha hun QSI collection se.
Executive: QSI collection se, theek hai. Kya issue hai sir?
Customer: Main bata raha hun, mere ek Mumbai ki party hai Goodland Goodlight LLP aapke IndiaMART pe registered hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Customer: Is bande ko maine maal becha hai, pickle ball net hota hai apne paas ek, tennis pickle ball net.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Iska 3.5 lakh ka, 3,45,300 ka mera bill hai.
Executive: Okay.
Customer: Pehle in logo ne bola ki aap maal pahucha do to hum payment kar denge. Daan ki pehle kuch hamare se delay hua tha to humne inka payment kar di, maal bhej diya humne. Inhone payment kuch kara nahi tha, humne inko pura maal bhej diya. Ab inhone transport ka paisa wagera sab lag ke 3 lakh 3,35,000 something ka bill hai. Baki ka humne iske andar transport sab kuch add karke inka sab mera proof hai, har cheez ka proof mere paas hai. 3,45,000 baitha hai mere bill.
Executive: Okay. Inhone maal le liya. Pehle inhone bola tha ki maal lene ke baad do din mein payment karenge aapka half payment 50% do din mein kar denge maal milne ke baad aur remaining baki ka jo 50% bachega wo karenge hum aapka 15 din ke andar, theek hai?
Executive: Okay. Ab inko maal liye 15 din ho chuke hain.
Customer: Hmm, theek hai. To maine bhi payment ka bola. Jab maine do din maal payment nahi kar theek hai aaj half payment kar denge. To ab ye bolte hain mere ko ki aapka payment hoga sir baad mein. Abhi 15 din aur baad hoga aur hoga bhi kis tarike se? Jaise jaise hum inhone humse 100 net liye hain. Jaise jaise humara net bikenge waise waise hum aapka payment karenge. Jabki mere pe inka recording hai, mere paas inka pura proof hai, screenshot hai ji chat ke har cheez mere paas available hai. Inhone bol rakha tha ki maal pahuchte hi payment kar denge, abhi meri payment nahi kar rahe.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Koi baat nahi to iska hum complaint raise karwa dete hain. Isme kuch cheezo ki document ki zarurat padegi. Sab milega aapko jo bologe aap.
Customer: Aapke jo account manager hai na current time pe Shiva Srivastava, theek hai?
Executive: Main unse whatsapp pe message karwa raha hun aapko. Aap unke whatsapp pe jo bhi details hain jaise aapne unko invoice diya hoga na to main aapko bataun. Inka jo IndiaMART pe profile chal raha hai na ye, ye band hona chahiye bilkul. Inquiry har cheez band honi chahiye isse tab mere ko fayda milega aap logo se.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main isko resolve karwa deta hun. Aur fraud kar rahe hain mere sath ye?
Customer: Haan. Koi baat nahi wo aapka resolve ho jayega. Process batata hun, ho jayega resolve. Isme abhi main message karaunga Shiva se aapke whatsapp pe. To uske baad aapko bolna hai.
Customer: Haan, aap Shiva ko number dal dena unka jo bhi details share ki hai matlab aapne aur aapne jo invoice unko diya hoga na to us.
Executive: Haan, usme invoice mein bhi aapne mention kiya hoga na transportation charge wagera lagega.
Customer: Wo transport sab mera kul mila ke do bill hai dono bill kara chahiye baat khatam main aapko bhej dunga sari detail bhej raha hun aapko abhi.
Executive: Koi baat nahi main message kara raha hun wo bhej dena aur asal mein kya hai na ki aapki company bhi yahan pe registered hai na QSI collection. To is wajah se ye complaint hamare liye khul gayi aapne customer care pe call kiya na to wo hamare liye khul gayi ki hamari taraf se IndiaMART ki taraf se hai to aapko koi dikkat nahi hui hai. To uske liye hum log ye ticket close kar sakte hain na aapka matlab hamari taraf se to koi issue hoga nahi jo aapko unse issue hai wo kara denge.
Customer: Ye mere ko customer the, customer the mere.
Executive: Samajh gaya. Actually wo aapki company registered hai na to isliye hamare paas khul gaya. To aapka ticket hum close kara de rahe hain aur baki abhi detail aap dal dijiye sara main resolve kara deta hun. Main message karwa deta hun. Shiva sir ko bolo mere ko abhi call karein do minute ke andar call aani chahiye mere paas abhi.
Executive: Main dekh le raha hun agar wo available hai to main turant karwa de raha hun.
Customer: Abhi karwa de raha hun.
Executive: Ji, ji sir. Thank you sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received payment for goods.

- Wants to block the buyer's IndiaMART profile.



Resolution:

- Executive assured resolution and complaint registration.

- Executive will message Shiva to assist customer.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to share details with Shiva on WhatsApp.



Alert (If Any):

fraud

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, complaint, resolution, profile block
